text: Bruno Vella (3 April 1933 â€“ 13 November 2021) was an Italian Socialist politician. He was President of the Province of Rieti from 1975 to 1982, Mayor of Rieti from 1982 to 1983, and served on the Senate of the Republic from 1983 to 1992. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Italian mayors Category:Politicians from Lazio
title: Bruno Vella
